page.title: 02POPULATION IN STOURPORT
page.content: The population grew originally due to the coming of the{canals.}The coming of the{railways}slowed this growth.In our survey 24% of people moved to Stourport because of their {employment}whilst a staggering 76% moved because{environmental}reasons. This has created the growth over the last 20 years. Of the children in the survey 90% were born within the locality,of parents 43% were born within the locality and only 20% of grandparents. A further 30% of parents and 40% of grandparents were born up to 30 miles away.5% of parents and 20% of grandparents were born in another country.
